item.title: Crypto stocks have outperformed bitcoin since April. Wolfe Research likes these names
item.description: Bitcoin has been trading sideways in recent weeks as other crypto ecosystems like Ethereum and Solana take their turns in the spotlight.

item.title: Bank of America downgrades UPS and FedEx on Trump ending de minimis shipping exemption
item.description: Trump's removal of the de minimis exemption, which allowed low-value packages to arrive to the U.S. without trade duties, went into effect on Friday.

item.title: Nvidia gets an upgrade from D.A. Davidson, which calls chipmaker ‘the heart of the AI trade’
item.description: D.A. Davidson sees further upside of 18% ahead for AI trade poster child Nvidia.

item.title: D.A. Davidson downgrades Apple after iPhone maker unveils ‘uninspired’ products
item.description: D.A. Davidson maintained its $250 price target on Apple, implying a 10% upside from the iPhone maker's Wednesday close.

item.title: This energy drink stock has doubled this year, and Goldman sees even more gains ahead
item.description: The bank initiated shares of the energy drink producer at a buy rating.
